anc-survey.title: Q_seen
anc-survey.content:
Good to hear. Before we continue, here are a few things to know:

You can answer *in your own words* — there’s no right or wrong!
You can *ask us questions about this study* any time.
Don’t want to answer something? Just type *skip*.

Did a health worker see you?

anc-survey.title: start_going_soon
anc-survey.content: OK, that's great! We'll check in a few days to see how it went 💕

anc-survey.title: seen_yes
anc-survey.content:
That’s good to hear 🌟

We’d love to know how your check-up went..  

Do you have 2 minutes to tell us about it?

anc-survey.title: Q_bp
anc-survey.content: Did someone take your blood pressure at this check-up?

anc-survey.title: Q_experience
anc-survey.content: How was your overall experience at the check-up?

anc-survey.title: bad
anc-survey.content:
We’re sorry to hear you had a bad experience.

By telling us a bit more,  you can help us understand how to improve services for pregnant women in South Africa.

Ready to tell us?

anc-survey.title: good
anc-survey.content:
Thank you for telling us.

There are just 2 more questions. Your answers to these will help us understand how we can make services better for pregnant women in South Africa.

Ready to go?

anc-survey.title: Q_visit_bad
anc-survey.content: Respond with an option from this list to share what made you the most uncomfortable or caused you *the biggest problem* at your check-up:

anc-survey.title: Q_visit_good
anc-survey.content:
We're glad your visit to the clinic went OK, but we know how busy clinics can get! This can lead to some challenges. 

If there was anything you found difficult, tell us what made you the most uncomfortable or caused you *the biggest problem*:

anc-survey.title: Q_visit_other
anc-survey.content:
Can you tell us a bit more about what made you the most uncomfortable or caused you *the biggest problem* at the check-up?

Please type your reply

anc-survey.title: Q_challenges
anc-survey.content: Getting to these check-ups can sometimes be difficult. If you find it hard, what is your *biggest challenge*?

anc-survey.title: Q_challenges_other
anc-survey.content: Can you tell us a bit more about this? Please type a reply with some more information.

anc-survey.title: Q_seen_no
anc-survey.content:
We’re sorry to hear that. Do you have time to tell us what happened?

Do you have 2 minutes to tell us about it?

anc-survey.title: start_not_going
anc-survey.content: We're sorry to hear that. Can you tell us a bit more about why you're not going?

anc-survey.title: Q_why_no_visit
anc-survey.content: Can you tell us the main reason you didn't see a health worker when you went to the clinic?

anc-survey.title: Q_why_no_visit_other
anc-survey.content:
Can you please tell us what the most important thing was that stopped you from getting to your pregnancy check-up? 

Type and send your answer👇🏽

anc-survey.title: Q_why_not_go
anc-survey.content: Many women struggle to get to these check-ups. What was the *number 1 reason* you didn't get to this one?

anc-survey.title: Q_why_not_go_other
anc-survey.content:
Can you please tell us what the most important thing was that stopped you from getting to your pregnancy check-up? 

Type and send your answer👇🏽

anc-survey.title: intent
anc-survey.content:
Thank you for taking the time to answer our questions! 🌟 

Remember, going to all your pregnancy check-ups is the best way to make sure that you and baby stay healthy 💪🏽 

During pregnancy, your body changes a lot. The earlier a possible problem with you or baby is identified, the quicker it can be treated. 

Do you think you will go for your next check-up?

anc-survey.title: not_going_next_one
anc-survey.content: Every check-up is important. Even if it's hard to get to them, please try your best to go.

anc-survey.title: feedback_if_first_survey
anc-survey.content:
Before you go, one more thing.

*How easy was it to answer these questions?*

anc-survey.title: end_if_feedback
anc-survey.content:
Thanks for your feedback. We'll be back with some more questions in the next few weeks! 💕

Click on this link to go to MomConnect: https://wa.me/27796312456

anc-survey.title: end
anc-survey.content:
Have a great day! We'll be back with some more questions in the next few weeks! 💕

Click on this link to go to MomConnect: https://wa.me/27796312456

anc-survey.title: mom_ANC_remind_me_01
anc-survey.content: No problem! We'll remind you tomorrow. We'd really like to know how it went at the clinic.

anc-survey.title: mom_ANC_remind_me_02
anc-survey.content: OK, we'll remind you tomorrow 🗓️

anc-survey.title: mom_ANC_reengagement_01
anc-survey.content:
Hello 👋🏽

You started telling us about your recent pregnancy check-up 🗓️

Have a few minutes to complete this now?

anc-survey.title: mom_ANC_reengagement_02
anc-survey.content:
Hi 👋🏽

You asked us to remind you to tell us more about your recent clinic visit!

Ready?
